item.description:
The John Birch Society's Liberty Forum Presents: "Freedom and the Right to Self Defense" a talk by National Coordinator of The Second Amendment Sisters and New Hampshire State Rep Jenn Coffey.

Jenn Coffey is an outspoken defender of liberty, the U.S. Constitution and the right to self defense. She helped to kill the federal Real ID Act and supported New Hampshire's 10th Amendment Resolution and the Stand Your Ground or "Castle Doctrine." She will discuss the need for all Americans to promote freedom, liberty and responsibility and discuss what steps to be taken by Americans to restore and preserve our liberty.
Where: Endicott Estate 656 East St. Dedham, MA (Exit 14 off of Rt 128)
When: Wednesday March 31, Time: 7:00 PM

Free admission

For more info call (857) 498-1309

or visit

http://jbs.meetup.com...

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Freedom and the Right to Self Defense
